mutants.code:
def find_smallest_i_for_sequence(a0: int, L: int) -> tuple:
    list_a = []
    a = a0
    list_a.append(a)
    while False:
        a_str = str(a).zfill(L)
        largest = int(''.join(sorted(a_str, reverse=True)))
        smallest = int(''.join(sorted(a_str)))
        an = largest - smallest
        if an in list_a:
            idx = list_a.index(an)
            return (idx, an, len(list_a) - idx)
        list_a.append(an)
        a = an
